                                                                            JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                            For table with change indicator components,you can use following css import code:
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.dropdowns.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.inputfield.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.table-normal.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
        
                                                                            
    <!-- Standard table with change indicators -->
    <table class="n-table n-table-standard n-table-striped n-table-cell-hover n-table-indication">
    <thead>
    <tr>
    <th class="n-row-indicated"></th> // Define the indicator column in table head.
    ...
    </tr>
    </thead>

    <tbody>
    <tr>
    <td class="text-center n-row-indicated"><span class="icon icon-edited"></span></td> // Define the indicator in row.
    ...
    <tr>
    ...
    </table>

    <!-- Input field with change indicators -->
    <td class="n-cell-control">
    <div class="n-inputfield-indicated">
    <input type="text" class="n-inputfield" value="10.39.190.96">
    <a class="form-control-feedback"><span class="icon icon-edited-small"></span></a>
    </div>
    </td>

    <!-- Checkbox with change indicators -->
    <td>
    <div class="checkbox checkbox-small checkbox-indicated">
    <input type="checkbox" id="cb3"/>
    <label for="cb3">Option3</label>
    <span class="icon icon-edited-small align-right"></span>
    </div>
    </td>

    <!-- Combobox with change indicators -->
    <td class="n-cell-control n-cell-dropdown">
    <div class="btn-group selectlist selectlist-small selectlist-indicated" data-resize="auto" data-initialize="selectlist" id="mySelectlist15">
    <button class="btn btn-default dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" type="button" aria-expanded="false">
    <span class="selected-label"><span>Three1</span></span>
    <span class="selected-caret"><span class="caret"></span></span>
    <span class="sr-only">Toggle Dropdown</span>
    </button>
    <ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu">
    <li data-value="1"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>One</span></a></li>
    ...
    </ul>
    <input class="hidden hidden-field" name="mySelectlist3" readonly="readonly" aria-hidden="true" type="text">
    <a class="form-control-feedback"><span class="icon icon-edited-small"></span></a>
    </div>
    </td>

                                                                            		Critical fault
                                                                            • One

                                                                            JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                            For table with paging components,you can use following css import code:
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.table-normal.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.buttons.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.dropdowns.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.combobox.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.inputfield.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
        
                                                                            
    <!-- Standard table with paging row -->
    <table class="n-table-pageing">
        <thead>...</thead>
        <tbody>...</tbody>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="7">
                    <div class="n-table-total">
                        <span>Total: <span>5237</span></span>
                    </div>

                    <div class="n-table-pagenum">
                        <button class="btn btn-icon">
                            <span class="icon icon-first"></span>
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-icon">
                            <span class="icon icon-back"></span>
                        </button>
                        <span>Page</span><input id="Example1" type="text" class="n-inputfield" placeholder="1"><span>/255</span>
                        <button class="btn btn-icon">
                            <span class="icon icon-next"></span>
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-icon">
                            <span class="icon icon-last"></span>
                        </button>
                    </div>

                    <div class="n-table-pageselect">
                        <div class="n-table-pagecombox">
                            <div class="input-group input-append dropdown combobox n-page-combox" data-initialize="combobox" id="myCombobox1">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control n-inputfield">
                            <div class="input-group-btn">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-default dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown"><span
                            class="caret"></span></button>
                            <ul class="dropdown-menu dropdown-menu-right" role="menu">
                                <li data-value="1"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>1</span></a></li>
                                <li data-value="2"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>2</span></a></li>
                                <li data-value="3"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>3</span></a></li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="n-table-suffix">
                    <span>Items per page</span>
                </div>
            </div>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tfoot>
    </table>

    <!-- Java Script -->
    <script src="../wulfdist/js/dependencies/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="../wulfdist/js/dependencies/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
    <script src="../wulfdist/js/dependencies/fuelux.min.js"></script>
    <script src="../wulfdist/js/dependencies/jquery.mousewheel.min.js"></script>
    <script src="../wulfdist/js/dependencies/jquery.mCustomScrollbar.js"></script>
    <script src="../wulfdist/js/wulf.min.js"></script>

    <script>
    $('#myCombobox1').combobox();
        $(document).ready(function () {
            $('ul.dropdown-menu.dropdown-menu-right li').click(function () {
            $('ul.dropdown-menu.dropdown-menu-right li').removeClass('selected');
            $(this).addClass('selected');
        });
    });
    </script>

                                                                            Table with scrollbar DRAFT

                                                                            Supports OT3 Specification (aug-2014) page 146 and 148 excluding header pulldown, icon control and selected error/alert.

                                                                            Standard table with alternating rows and cell selection

                                                                            With icon With text With editable cell Checkbox cell Dropdown cell With error/alert With number
                                                                            		Critical fault
                                                                            • One
                                                                            • Two
                                                                            • Three
                                                                            • Four
                                                                            • Five - Very long long long long long long long text
                                                                            		2010 910
                                                                            		Major fault
                                                                            • One
                                                                            • Two
                                                                            • Three
                                                                            • Four
                                                                            • Five - Very long long long long long long long text
                                                                            		2010 910
                                                                            		Minor fault
                                                                            • One
                                                                            • Two
                                                                            • Three
                                                                            • Four
                                                                            • Five - Very long long long long long long long text
                                                                            		2010 910
                                                                            		Warning
                                                                            • One
                                                                            • Two
                                                                            • Three
                                                                            • Four
                                                                            • Five - Very long long long long long long long text
                                                                            		2010 910
                                                                            		Fault cleared
                                                                            • One
                                                                            • Two
                                                                            • Three
                                                                            • Four
                                                                            • Five - Very long long long long long long long text
                                                                            		2010 910
                                                                            		Unknown situation
                                                                            • One
                                                                            • Two
                                                                            • Three
                                                                            • Four
                                                                            • Five - Very long long long long long long long text
                                                                            		2010 910

                                                                            JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                            For table with scrollbar components,you can use following css import code:
<link href="../wulfdist/css/fulux.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.buttons.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.calendar.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.dropdowns.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.inputfield.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.table-normal.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.tooltip.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
        
                                                                            
    <!-- Standard table with alternating rows and cell selection -->
    <table class="n-table n-table-standard n-table-striped n-table-cell-hover">
        <thead>...</thead>
        <tbody class="n-table-scrollbar">...</tbody>
    </table>

    <!-- The default value of table height is 150px. You can change the table height by definition of follow style -->
    .n-table-scrollbar .mCustomScrollBox{
        height: 100px;
    }

    <!-- Standard table with calendar and button -->
    <table class="n-table n-table-standard n-table-striped n-table-cell-hover">
        <thead>...</thead>
        <tbody class="n-table-scrollbar">
            </tr>
            ...
                <td class="n-cell-control">
                    <div class="btn-group selectlist selectlist-small" data-resize="auto" data-initialize="selectlist" data-position="fixed"
                         id="mySelectlist51" >
                        <button class="btn btn-default dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" type="button" aria-expanded="false">
                            <span class="selected-label"><span>Three1</span></span>
                            <span class="selected-caret" ><span class="caret"></span></span>
                            <span class="sr-only">Toggle Dropdown</span>
                        </button>
                        <ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu">
                            <li data-value="1"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>One</span></a></li>
                            ...
                        </ul>
                        <input class="hidden hidden-field" name="mySelectlist45" readonly="readonly" aria-hidden="true"
                               type="text">
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td class="text-center">
                    <div id="calendar_date1" class="datepicker fuelux">
                        <div class="input-group n-calendar calendar-small">
                            <input id="calendar-id1" name="calendar-name" type="text"
                                   class="form-control n-inputfield" data-markup="calendar" data-position="fixed"/>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </td>
                <td class="text-center">
                    <input type="button" class="btn btn-small" value="Details" />
                </td>
            ...
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>

                                                                            Tips

                                                                            In order to show scrollbar correct, the scrollbar will be auto updated per 60ms as default.
You can switch on/off the auto updating by yourself.

Two ways to switch off auto updating
   1. Add classname "scrollbar-not-autoupdate" together with "n-*-scroll"
   2. Call nScrollbar with option: {notAutoUpdate:true}

Example:
   1. Using classname:
       <table class="n-table n-table-standard n-table-striped n-table-cell-hover">
            <thead>...</thead>
            <tbody class="n-table-scrollbar scrollbar-not-autoupdate">...</tbody>
       </table>

   2. Using nScrollbar()
       $(document).ready(function(){
           $(".n-table-scrollbar").nScrollbar({notAutoUpdate:true});
           $(".n-dropdown-menu-scroll").nScrollbar({notAutoUpdate:true});
           ......
       })

You need to update scrollbar once data is added/removed if auto Updating is switched off.
   Example:
     $(".n-table-scrollbar").nScrollbar("update");
     $(".n-dropdown-menu-scroll").nScrollbar("update");
     ....

                                                                            Table

                                                                            Supports OT3 Specification (aug-2014) page 146 and 148 excluding header pulldown, icon control and selected error/alert.

                                                                            JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                            For Table components, it will be ok to import following css file :
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.table-normal.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>

                                                                            Source code for table content in all tables: 

                                                                            
    <!-- Cell with icon -->
    <td class="text-center"><span class="icon icon-fault-critical"></span></td>

    <!-- Editable cell -->
    <td><input type="text" class="n-inputfield" style="top: 0.5px; position: relative;" style="top: 0.5px; position: relative;" value="10.39.190.96"></td>

    <!-- Checkbox cell -->
    <td>
        <div class="checkbox checkbox-small">
            <input id="xx5" type="checkbox"/>
            <label for="xx5"> Option1 </label>
        </div>
    </td>

    <!-- Cell with dropdown -->
    <td class="n-cell-control n-cell-dropdown" >
        <div class="btn-group selectlist selectlist-small" data-resize="auto" data-initialize="selectlist" id="mySelectlist1">
            <button class="btn btn-default dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" type="button">
                <span class="selected-label"></span>
                <span class="selected-caret" ><span class="caret"></span></span>
                <span class="sr-only">Toggle Dropdown</span>
            </button>
            <ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu">
                <li data-value="1"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>One</span></a></li>
                <li data-value="2"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>Two</span></a></li>
                <li data-value="3"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>Three</span></a></li>
                <li data-value="4"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>Four</span></a></li>
                <li data-value="5"><a href="javascript:void(0);"><span>Five</span></a></li>
            </ul>
            <input class="hidden hidden-field" name="mySelectlist" readonly="readonly" aria-hidden="true" type="text"/>
        </div>
    </td>
    <-- JS-script needed -->
        <script src="../wulfdist/js/dependencies/fuelux.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

    <!-- Cell with error -->
    <td class="n-cell-error">2010</td>

    <!-- Cell with number -->
    <td class="text-right">910</td>

                                                                            Taskpad

                                                                              • Loading...

                                                                              The taskpad is a flyout menu with expansion. Interactivity follows the standard tree control. It also uses the search with clear selection.

                                                                              JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                              For taskpad components, it will be ok to import following css file:
<link href="../wulfdist/css/fuelux.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.inputfield.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.search.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.links.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.tree-normal.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.flyout.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
                                                                              
    <div class="n-flyout n-taskpad" id="myFlyout">
    <div class="n-flyout-container">
    <div class="n-taskpad-header">
    <div class="n-search n-search-clearable n-taskpad-header-search">
    <-- Search box with clear selection -->
    </div>
    <a class="n-taskpad-header-settings href="#">
    <span class="icon icon-settings"></span>
    </a>
    </div>
    <div class="fuelux menu-tree n-taskpad-tree">
    <-- Tree component without checkbox -->
    </div>
    </div>
    <a class="n-flyout-open" href="#">
    <i class="icon icon-list"></i>
    </a>
    </div>
    <!-- Needed scripts -->
    <script>require(['jquery', 'wulf_umd']);</script>
    
                                                                              
    To use description and icon on the tree. Add "icon" and "desc" on a data source.
    { "name": "Language", "icon": "icon-fault-major", "desc": "Language Selection"...

                                                                              Text area with scrollbar

                                                                              Add class content-scroll in div, which has textarea child that has class n-textarea. Also you can change the width and height of textarea by overriding class name ".content-scroll" if you want as in following example.

                                                                              
    <form role="form">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="content content-scroll">
                <label for="ta-scroll">Scrolling text area</label>
                <textarea id="ta-scroll" class="n-textarea">TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT</textarea>
            </div>
        </div>
    </form>

    // Change the textarea width and height if you want
    <style>
        .content-scroll{width:200px; height:200px;}
    </style>

                                                                              Text area

                                                                              JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                              For text area components, it will be ok to import following css file:
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.textarea.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

                                                                              Add class n-textarea under the textarea element:

                                                                              
    <!-- Text area -->
    <form role="form">
        <div class="form-group">
            <label for="ta-normal">Normal text area</label>
            <textarea id="ta-normal" class="n-textarea">
                TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT
            </textarea>
        </div>
    </form>

                                                                              Add class n-textarea under the textarea element and disabled label after the element:

                                                                              
    <!-- Text area (disabled) -->
    <form role="form">
        <div class="form-group">
            <label for="ta-disabled" class="control-label label-disabled">Disabled textarea</label>
            <textarea id="ta-disabled" class="n-textarea" disabled>
                TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT
            </textarea>
        </div>
    </form>

                                                                              Add class n-textarea under the textarea element and readonly label after the element:

                                                                              
    <!-- Text area (read-only) -->
    <form role="form">
        <div class="form-group">
            <label for="ta-readonly">Readonly textarea</label>
            <textarea id="ta-readonly" class="n-textarea" readonly>
                TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT
             </textarea>
        </div>
    </form>

                                                                              Add class content-scroll in div, which has textarea child that has class n-textarea. Also you can change the width and height of textarea by overriding class name ".content-scroll" if you want as in following example.

                                                                              
    <form role="form">
    <div class="form-group">
    <div class="content content-scroll">
    <label for="ta-scroll">Scrolling text area</label>
    <textarea id="ta-scroll" class="n-textarea">TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT TEXT</textarea>
    </div>
    </div>
    </form>

    // Change the textarea width and height if you want
    <style>
    .content-scroll{width:200px; height:200px;}
    </style>

                                                                              Toggles

                                                                              Standard
                                                                              Disabled

                                                                              JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                              For Toggle button components, it will be ok to import following css file:
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.buttons.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

                                                                              You can use a number of different Nokia-style toggle switches and buttons by adding n-toggle-switch or n-toggle-button class definition to a checkbox element.
                                                                              A number of different toggle button sizes are provided through additional size classes like n-toggle-switch-small and n-toggle-button-small
                                                                              There is a colored version for toggle switch by adding class n-toggle-switch-color to toggle switch
                                                                              There are dark and green versions of toggles button by adding class n-toggle-button-dark and n-toggle-button-green to toggle button 

                                                                              
    <div class="n-toggle-switch n-toggle-switch-standard n-toggle-switch-color">
        <input type="checkbox" name="example-toggle-name6" class="n-toggle-switch-input" id="example-id6" disabled>
        <label class="n-toggle-switch-container" for="example-id6">
            <span class="n-toggle-switch-handler"></span>
            <span class="n-toggle-switch-slider"></span>
        </label>
    </div>

    <button class="btn btn-icon-button n-toggle-button" data-toggle="button">
        <span class="icon icon-cancel"></span>
    </button>

    <button class="btn btn-icon-button n-toggle-button n-toggle-button-color" data-toggle="button">
        <span class="icon icon-settings"></span>
        <span>Toggle</span>
    </button>

                                                                              Tooltip

                                                                              Hold pointer on top of the links below for few seconds to get the tooltips visible.

                                                                              This text here is for demonstrating default tooltip behavior.
                                                                              This text here is for demonstrating forced bottom tooltip behavior.
                                                                              This text here is for demonstrating forced right tooltip behavior.

                                                                              JS & CSS dependency:

                                                                              For tooltip components, it will be ok to import following css file:
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.basic.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
<link href="../wulfdist/css/wulf.tooltip.min.css" rel="stylesheet"/>
                                                                              Data-placement can be: top | bottom | left | right + left empty + optionally also auto to allow automatic positioning on the opposite side near screen edges. 

                                                                              
	<!-- Basic tooltip -->
	Some <a class="link" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="bottom" href="#" title="explanation text">text</a> to explain more with tooltip.

	<!-- JS-script needed -->
	<script>
	   $(function () {
		  $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
	   })
	</script>
                                                                              Option: container. Appends the tooltip to a specific element. Example: container: 'body'. This option is particularly useful in that it allows you to position the tooltip in the flow of the document near the triggering element - which will prevent the tooltip from floating away from the triggering element during a window resize. 
                                                                              
	<!-- JS-script -->
	<script>
	  $(function () {
	    $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip({container: 'body', delay:500});
	  })
	</script>

                                                                              Typography

                                                                              • Chart Header

                                                                              • Product Name

                                                                              • Header

                                                                              • Subheader

                                                                              • Normal text
                                                                              • MON, 3 DAYS 
                                                                                          
    <!-- Chart header - Nokia Pure Regular, 40px -->
    <h1 class="n-chart-header">Chart header</h1>

    <!-- Product name - Nokia Pure Bold, 21px -->
    <h1 class="n-product-name">Product name</h1>

    <!-- Header - Nokia Pure Regular, 20px -->
    <h1>Header</h1>

    <!-- Subheader - Nokia Pure Regular, 16px -->
    <h2>Subheader</h2>

    <!-- Labels, text - Nokia Pure Regular, 14px -->
    Normal text...

    <!-- Calendar days - Nokia Pure Bold, 12px, ALL CAPS -->
    <span class="n-calendar-days">DAYS: MON, 3 DAYS</span>

                                                                              Fonts

                                                                              Nokia Pure is the primary typefaces for the Nokia user interface. For instances where the Nokia Pure webfont cannot be rendered in a satisfactory manner or is unavailable, Arial font may be used instead.


                                                                              Nokia Pure Light
                                                                              ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
                                                                              abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
                                                                              0123456789
                                                                              Nokia Pure Regular
                                                                              ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
                                                                              abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
                                                                              0123456789
                                                                              Nokia Pure Bold
                                                                              ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
                                                                              abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
                                                                              0123456789
                                                                              ghi abc def
                                                                              ACME 1000 1947
                                                                              XYZ 1000 1973
